Requests.GetAllSubcategories: SELECT SubcategoryId, CategoryId, SubcategoryName FROM Subcategories
Requests.GetAllProducts: SELECT ProductId, SubcategoryId, ProductName, ProductDescription, ProductImageUrl FROM Products
Requests.GetAllImages: SELECT ImageId, ProductId, ImageUrl FROM Images
Requests.GetAllModules: SELECT ModuleId, ProductId, ModuleName, ModuleDescription, ModuleImageUrl FROM Modules
Requests.GetAllSizes: SELECT SizeId, ModuleId, SizeValue FROM Sizes
Requests.GetAllColors: SELECR ColorId, ModuleId, FacadeColorName, FacadeColorImageUrl, BodyColorName, BodyColorImageUrl FROM Colors
